baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Mind Tremor bonus based on enemies affected, Awakening Ultimate Skill Crit Damage boost, Mind Tremor - Overwhelm, Mind Break - Enhance, and buffs with long cooldowns

build: -> -> -> -> ->

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Psychic Grab - Boss Point and Reinforce
  • Mind Tremor - Overwhelm
  • Kinetic Combo - Opportunity and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time
nodeInfo.possible: • Psychic Grab also boosts Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)

extraContent.title: Psychic Points
extraContent.content: Kinesis does not use MP and instead uses Psychic Points (PP) for special Ultimate skills. PP is generated by using most non-Ultimate skills. Your PP capacity will increase every time you Job Advance (excluding 5th Job)

primary.name: Psychic Attack
primary.shortDesc: Up to 1 enemies attacked 1 times at 100% damage\n[Charges 1 Psychic Points when used]
primary.desc: Deals a ranged attack to one enemy in front of you
details: Charges PP when used

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns to Kinesis's Hideout.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: ESP
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: 10%, Avoidability: 12%, Speed: +10
details: Upon completing the tutorial, 6 SP are given that can all be allocated to this skill

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'King: Master of Space and Time'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Mental Fortitude
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%, Magic ATT: +10, Jump: +10, Speed: +10, and Max Speed: +10

primary.name: Kinetic Crash
primary.shortDesc: Up to 4 enemies attacked 2 times at 140% damage\n[Charges 1 Psychic Points when used]
primary.desc: Tosses enemies in front of you up and down
details: Charges PP when used

primary.name: Psychic Force
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Knocked Back: 4, Damage Over Time: 20%, Damage Over Time Duration: 30 sec, Damage Increase During Damage Over Time: 10% per sec, Max Increase During Damage Over Time: 200%
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect - Magic ATT: +10]
[Psychic Points Charged During Skill Use: 1]
primary.desc: Pushes several enemies back while applying debuff
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants flat Magic Attack
Charges PP when used

primary.name: Ultimate - Metal Press
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 7. Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 12, DEF on damaged enemies: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Drops a metal object on top of enemies in front of you that damages and debuffs enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %DEF
  • Does not stack with debuffs from and
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Mental Shield
primary.shortDesc: Cancel 60% of damage received by consuming 1 Psychic Point. Can be toggled On/Off

primary.name: ESP Booster
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 180 sec, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Kinetic Step
primary.shortDesc: Jump a set distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, you can press the Up Key and Jump Key together to perform a vertical jump
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Kinetic Piledriver
primary.shortDesc: Up to 8 enemies attacked 2 times at 280% damage\n[Charges 1 Psychic Points when used]
primary.desc: Lifts enemies into the air and smashes them to the ground
details: Charges PP when used

primary.name: ESP Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Psy-limiter Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +10%, and INT: +40

primary.name: Psychic Blast
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Knocked Back: 6, Damage Over Time: 40%, Damage Over Time Duration: 30 sec, Damage Increase During Damage Over Time: 25% per sec, Max Increase During Damage Over Time: 400%
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect - Magic ATT: +10]
[Psychic Points Charged During Skill Use: 1]
primary.desc: Pulls enemies above you to your platform
details: Activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and together
Increases %Damage Over Time and max enemies knocked back
Increases %Damage Increase during Damage Over Time and max amount of %Damage Increase
Increases Magic Attack provided

primary.name: Psychic Drain
primary.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 150%, Duration: 30 sec. Restores 1 Psychic Point on each use upon attacking normal enemies, Cooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: 40% chance to restore 1 Psychic Points upon attacking bosses]
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants successful attacks on a boss a chance to restore 1 Psychic Point
Regular Monsters damaged by the area grants 1 Psychic Point
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ultimate - Deep Impact
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Point 2 consumed. Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 7. Targets hit have all buffs removed\nDamage for [Ultimate - Metal Press] +130%
primary.desc: Leap into the air and dash down to the ground at an angle
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of
Attack is considered a teleport and can be used to dodge certain attacks such as P1 Lotus' lasers
Enemies hit will have all buffs removed
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Psychic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 20%, Defense: +300

primary.name: Pure Power
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +20%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Mental Strength
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Magic ATT: +10, Jump: +10, Speed: +10, and Max Speed: +10

primary.name: Psychic Grab
primary.shortDesc: 3 enemies lifted up and controlled with the powers of psychokinesis.\n[Psychic Smash]: Enemies Hit Including Grabbed Enemy: 8, Damage: 340%, Number of Attacks: 3. Recovers 1 Psychic Point.
primary.desc: Lifts up enemies or objects and uses them to attack
details: You cannot lift bosses or enemies much higher level than you
Charges PP when used

primary.name: Psychic Assault
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Knocked Back: 8, Damage Over Time: 75%, Damage Over Time Duration: 30 sec, Damage Increase During Damage Over Time: 50% per sec, Max Increase During Damage Over Time: 700%
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect - Magic ATT: +10]
[Psychic Points Charged During Skill Use: 1]
details: Increases %Damage Over Time and max enemies knocked back
Increases %Damage Increase during Damage Over Time and max amount of %Damage Increase
Increases Magic Attack provided

primary.name: Mind Tremor
primary.shortDesc:
Reduces up to 5 enemies' speed by 25%. Ignores an additional 10% DEF and applies a debuff that increases Final Damage by 10% to Kinesis's attack.
Duration: 30. For enemies who leave the area of effect, the debuff lingers for a time equal to the time they spent in the area of effect.
[Psychic Point recovery during skill use: 1]
Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Creates an area on the ground that slows, decreases enemy %DEF and debuffs while enemies in are it
details:
[Debuff]: Increases %Final Damage dealt to enemy
  • For enemies that leave the zone, the debuff duration is equal to the duration spent within it
Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ultimate - Trainwreck
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Points Consumption: 15, Max Enemies hit: 5, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 6, Duration: 12 sec, Ultimate - Trainwreck Damage during damage duration: -5%\n[Ultimate - Metal Press] Damage: +140%\n[Ultimate - Deep Impact] Damage: +100%
primary.desc: Summons a train that continuously smashes down on enemies
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage of and
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Kinetic Combo
primary.shortDesc: 70% chance to automatically attack nearby enemies with surrounding objects for 350% damage when attack hits.
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to create an additional attack that seeks and attacks a nearby enemy
details: Does not activate when using Ultimate-type skills, , , , or

primary.name: Psychic Bulwark
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Defense by 200 and Knockback Resistance by 100%.
details: Increases DEF provided
Now increases %Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Kinetic Jaunt
primary.shortDesc: Move up quickly and in selected directions. Duration increases with skill level.\nCasting this skill while using other skills costs 2 Psychic Points\nCooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: While held, levitate up into the air
details: You can move while this skill is held
Costs PP when cast while using other skills and the cooldown is increased (to 8 sec)

primary.name: Psychic Reinforcement
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Third Eye
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Transcendence
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +20, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Mitigation
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -15%

primary.name: Psychic Clutch
primary.shortDesc: Lifts 5 enemies and controls them with the powers of psychokinesis.\n[Psychic Smash]: Enemies Hit Including Grabbed Enemy: 8, Damage: 470%, Number of Attacks: 5. Recovers 1 Psychic Point, DEF on damaged enemies: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30 sec.
details:
Now grants a debuff that reduces %DEF to enemies hit
  • Does not stack with debuffs from and
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit
Increases amount of enemies grabbed

primary.name: Ultimate - Psychic Shot
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 5. Damage per projectile: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3, DEF on damaged enemies: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30
primary.desc: Throws the objects that you've grabbed with forward, damaging and debuffing enemies hit
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %DEF
  • Does not stack with debuffs from and
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
Shares Skill Points (SP) with
Can be activated by pressing the Up Key and together

primary.name: Ultimate - B.P.M.
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 175%, Number of Attacks: 7. When activated once, consumes 1 slot(s) of Psychic Points
Attack stops when Psychic Points are consumed, resumes attack when recovering more than 3 Psychic Points.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
[Ultimate - Metal Press] Damage: +310%p
[Ultimate - Deep Impact] Damage: +270%p
[Ultimate - Trainwreck] Damage: +100%p
primary.desc: While active, continously strike forward with a barrage of psychic punches
details: [Passive] Increases %Damage of , , and by a flat amount

Consumes PP only when attack successfully hits
  • Attack automatically stops when all PP is consumed and resumes once more than 3 PP is available
Can be used while casting other skills
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Mind Quake
primary.shortDesc:
Initial hit - Max Enemies hit: 5, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 4.
Reduces speed of enemies within the area by 30%.
Ignores an additional 15% DEF and applies a debuff that increases Final Damage by 15% to Kinesis's attack.
Duration: 30. For enemies who leave the area of effect, the debuff lingers for a time equal to the time they spent in the area of effect.
[Psychic Point recovery during skill use: 1]
Cooldown: 30 sec
details: Now damages enemies on initial hit
Increases slow and %DEF reduction effect
Increases %Final Damage from debuff

primary.name: Mind Break
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage 40% increase

primary.name: President's Orders
primary.shortDesc: Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Psychic Charger
primary.shortDesc: Charges 50% of the maximum points to reach maximum Psychic Points when used.\nCooldown: 45 sec\n[Passive Effect - Damage when attacking Boss: +30%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage

primary.name: Clear Mind
primary.shortDesc: Clear Status\nCooldown: 180 sec\n[Passive Effect - Abnormal Status Resistance: +20]
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
details: [Passive]: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance

primary.name: Telepath Tactics
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +50, Damage: +20%, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Awakening
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +15%, Ultimate Skill Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Supreme Concentration
primary.shortDesc: Buff Duration: +20%

primary.name: Critical Rush
primary.shortDesc: The gap between the minimum and maximum damage decreases a fixed amount every time you get 30 combo kills.
details: Combo kills as in the 'Combo' text that appears when you defeat an enemy
Effects are similar to what Weapon Mastery skills do

primary.name: Mind Scrambler
primary.shortDesc: Defense Ignored: 25%

primary.name: Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Weapon Mastery: +70%, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Psychic Grab - Boss Point
details: Increases PP charge when attacking bosses with

hyperPassive.name: Psychic Grab - Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Psychic Smash and Psychic Shot Damage: +20%

hyperPassive.name: Psychic Grab - Steel Skin
details: Grants a %DEF buff when used

hyperActive.name: Mental Tempest
hyperActive.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 400%, Max Projectiles: 16, Final Blow Damage: 1500%, Final Blow activates critical damage with Ignore DEF: +50%\nGrants invincibility during skill casting, and Psychic Points increase to maximum immediately upon casting.\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a barrage of your Ultimate attacks before releasing a deadly final blow
details: The final blow has increased %Ignore DEF
You are invincible while casting and you instantly gain max PP

hyperActive.name: Mental Shock
hyperActive.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 1, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nStun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Mental Shock.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a shockwave that binds nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Mental Overdrive
hyperActive.shortDesc: Reduces Psychic Point consumption by half for 26 sec while increasing the Psychic Points are continuously increased.\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: is not affected by reduced PP consumption

fifthMain.name: Psychic Tornado
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Psychic Point Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 4, Duration: 20 sec
The tornado of objects grows and grows until the skill ends or is used again, causing the objects inside to be thrown forward.
Thrown Object - Deals 413% damage on up to 10 enemies 2 times and explodes 3 times, dealing 900% damage up to 10 enemies 10 times. Final Damage increases up to 3 times in proportion to the object's size.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a cube above your head that damages nearby enemies while growing bigger and bigger
details:
Objects are also thrown out of the cube damaging enemies hit
  • Based on the size of the object, the %Final Damage of the attack will be increased
Once it grows to the maximum size, the cube will be thrown and cause an explosion
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Ultimate - Mind Over Matter
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Psychic Point Cost: 10, Duration: 30 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 5
While traveling towards you, object moves at 75% speed.
Inflicts an additional 1400% damage to up to 12 enemies 12 times when the object disappears.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a giant object that travels forward while damaging enemies
details: Using will push the object causing it to speed up
If the object hits the edge of the map, it will bounce back
Pressing the Skill Key again will redirect the object towards you
At the end of the duration, the object explodes
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Ultimate - Psychic Shockwave
fifthMain.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 3. Attacks the enemies you're lifting and up to 8 enemies in front of you to deal 1100% damage 6 time(s). Charges 1 Psychic Points when the skill lands successfully.\nMicro Black Hole: Activates a black hole 4 times. Damage: 1000%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3. Charges 1 Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a target.
fifthMain.desc: Throws the objects that you've grabbed with forward and creates a black hole at the max distance
details: Can be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and together
The black hole charges PP whenever the skill hits an enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Law of Gravity
fifthMain.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 5, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 6, Debuff Duration: 22\nPeriodically attacks up to 6 enemies with 1000% damage 8 times and pulls them in. Reduces the activation interval up to 3 times in proportion to the number of enemies pulled in so far, and Final Damage of the attack increases by 40%. If there is no enemy to pull in, objects will get pulled in instead. It will be regarded as the max number of enemies that can be attacked. Upon ending, it explodes to attack up to 10 enemies with 1200% damage 15 times.\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Damages and debuffs an enemy causing them to pull in nearby enemies and objects
details: If the enemy is defeated, an orb will take its place and also pull in nearby enemies and objects
Based on the number of enemies pulled in, the attack's frequency and %Final Damage will be increased
If no enemies are nearby to pull in, the objects that are pulled in will be treated as enemies instead
At the end of the duration, Law of Gravity will explode, damaging nearby enemies
Prioritizes enemies with the highest max HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: HEXA Ultimate - Metal Press
masteryCore.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 6.\nDamage: 1295%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 12, DEF on damaged enemies: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30 sec.

originSkill.name: From Another Realm
originSkill.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 5, invincible during casting\nExplosion occurs 15 times which attack up to 15 enemies with 8400% damage 12 times\nCooldown: 360 sec

meta: Kinesis is an INT Mage class part of the FriendStory class group. Kinesis does not use MP as a resource and instead has PP (Psychic Points) that skills consume. Kinesis charges his PP using special attacks and as well has a Double Jump skill instead of a Teleport like most Mages do
